ComicInfo.Summary:
The new Geomancer has put Gilad out of a job! Unhinged and reckless, Earth's ex-fist and steel repurposes himself as New York's latest highly-armed vigilante, conspiring with Lieutenant Morgan to single-handedly take down a "politically" protected crack den. Has the would-be Eternal Warrior rebranded himself into a viper's nest, or worse, an overdue grave?
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/eternal-warrior-28-the-immortal-war-part-one-adrif/4000-40003/
ComicInfo.Tags: Thomas Morgan,Immortal Enemy,Eternal Warrior,New York City,Greece
ComicInfo.Title: Adrift; (The Immortal War part 1)
